title: Absolute Value
code:
§begin absolute
  number ← -42
  zero ← 0
  §if number ⊘ zero
    result ← zero ⊖ number
  §else
    result ← number
  §end_if
  §transmit result
§end
solution_description: calculates the absolute value of a number
hints: If number is negative, it's converted to positive
